scripts.prepare:goerli: npm run --prefix=../../packages/constants prepare:goerli && mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.build:goerli: npm run prepare:goerli && graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run build:goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ stakewise/ethereum-goerli
scripts.prepare:mainnet: npm run --prefix=../../packages/constants prepare:mainnet && mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run build:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ stakewise/ethereum-mainnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet:local: npm run build:mainnet && npm run create:mainnet:local && graph deploy --version-label 1.4.2 --node $GRAPH_MAINNET_URL --ipfs $IPFS_MAINNET_URL stakewise/ethereum
